item.title: Docker Dev Env
item.description: Docker Dev Env Mission Connect and unify developer experience through streamlined environments Problem Building dev environments shouldn’t be a problem in 2020 Different dev styles leading to increased workloads Experience isn’t unified throughout the community Solution OSS based vscode and docker or kubernetes based dev env in browser Ability for chatting, coding, zenhub integration for the best experience possible in 2020 All code should be managed on the browser
